Name: Tongatapu
Description: Tongatapu is the largest and most populous island of Tonga, and it is the center of the country s political and cultural life. It is home to the capital, Nukualofa.

Name: Haapai
Description: Haapai is a group of islands in Tonga known for its white sandy beaches, clear waters, and a more laid-back, rural atmosphere.

Name: Vavau
Description: Vavau is an archipelago in northern Tonga, famous for its stunning harbors, tropical islands, and whale watching opportunities.

Name: Eua
Description: Eua is a small island located to the south of Tongatapu, known for its mountainous terrain, lush forests, and hiking opportunities.
